# WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.AsyncIterator

**Class**

An iterator for the sequence of devices.

## Declaration

```swift
class AsyncIterator
```

## Getting the next asynchronous update

- **WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.AsyncIterator.Element**: A dictionary holding a snapshot of currently paired devices accessible to your app.
- **next()**: Returns the next dictionary in the sequence.

## Throwing an error

- **WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.AsyncIterator.Failure**: The type of error that the sequence can produce.

## Getting async updates

- **makeAsyncIterator()**: Makes an asynchronous iterator that provides successive device snapshots when the list of paired devices known to the app changes.
- **WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.Element**: A dictionary holding a snapshot of currently paired devices accessible to your app.
